DOC.brief_summary: Study was performed to identify ECG criteria for unmasking of subjects with NSTEMI at elevated risk.
DOC.brief_title: TIII Over TI in Subjects With Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: In the present study the investigators assessed the value of T wave changes in subjects with NSTEMI (TIII>TI).
DOC.criteria: NSTEMI and PCI NSTEMI without percutaneous intervention
